title.narrative: Chongqing Small Towns Water Environment Management Project

description.narrative: The project development objective is to reduce flood risks and improve wastewater infrastructure services in selected counties of Chongqing Municipality.

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :Dam Safety Expert | Description :PA Schedule Section I C. 5(a). Hire and maintain throughout projectimplementation a Dam Safety Expert to (i) inspect and evaluate the status of the Dams, their appurtenances, and their performancehistory; (ii) review and evaluate the Dams’ operation and maintenance procedures; (iii) review the qualifications of the designerfor the overflow weirs to be rehabilitated under the Project, under ter | Due Date :01-Jul-2015

Finance Agreement :Dam Safety Expert | Description :PA Schedule Section I C. 5(b). Submit a written report of findings andrecommendations of the Dam Safety Expert for any remedial work or safety measures necessary to upgrade the dams, which is to besubmitted to the Bank along with an action plan by Chongqing to address the findings/recommendations of the report. | Frequency:Yearly
Finance Agreement :Institutional Arrangements | Description :PA Schedule Section I A. Maintain the CPMO, the county PMOs, andcounty PIUs throughout implementation with qualified and adequate staff.

Finance Agreement :Mid-term Review | Description :PA Schedule Section II A. 2. Carry out a Mid-Term Review of projectimplementation to make adjustments, as necessary, to achieve project objectives and to share experiences to date and lessonslearned with others. | Due Date :30-Jun-2017

Finance Agreement :Safeguard Instruments | Description :PA Schedule Section I C. Carrying out the project in accordance with theEnvironmental Management Plan, the Resettlement Action Plan, the Resettlement Policy Framework, and any Resettlement Action Plansprepared thereunder.

title.narrative: Flood risk maps prepared and disseminated for awareness raising in all project counties
PO-1 The total urban area vulnerable to design floods protected
Flood emergency preparedness plans developed and/or upgraded in all project counties
people participated in flood risk awareness raising activities in project sites. (male/female)
People provided with access to ‘improved sanitation facilities” under the proj.
Indicator 2. PO-2 people benefited from flood risk reduction (male and female)
